languages.text: {n}Бродяга с сомнением окидывает вас взглядом, но затем, поразмыслив, кивает.{/n} "Ладно. Кто еще поможет бедолаге в этом проклятом месте, если не другой бедолага? Пойдем, я отведу тебя в безопасное место". {n}Мутант делает приглашающий жест...{/n}

{n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бродяга с сомнением окидывает вас взглядом, но затем, поразмыслив, кивает.{/n} "Ладно. Кто еще поможет бедолаге в этом проклятом месте, если не другой бедолага? Пойдем, я отведу тебя в безопасное место". {n}Мутант делает приглашающий жест...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this cursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He makes an inviting gesture...{/n}

{n}The vagabond looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this cursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He makes an inviting gesture...{/n}

{n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He offers an inviting gesture...{/n}

{n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He offers an inviting gesture...{/n}

{n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

{n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞食はいぶかしげにこちらを見て、しばらく考えてからうなずく。{/n}「いいだろう。この呪われた場所で、不幸な魂を助けてくれるような人間は他にいないだろうしな？さあ、安全な場所に連れて行ってやろう」{n}彼は手招きをする…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食はいぶかしげにこちらを見て、しばらく考えてからうなずく。{/n}「いいだろう。この呪われた場所で、不幸な魂を助けてくれるような人間は他にいないだろうしな？さあ、安全な場所に連れて行ってやろう」{n}彼は誘うようなジェスチャーをする…{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞丐狐疑地盯着你，想了一会儿，之后点点头。{/n}“行吧，在这种该死的破地方，愿意帮助倒霉蛋的人，恐怕只有另一个倒霉蛋了，是吧？跟我来吧，我带你去个安全的地方。”{n}他做了个手势，招呼你跟在他身后……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐狐疑地盯着你，想了一会儿，之后点点头。{/n}“行吧，在这种该死的破地方，愿意帮助倒霉蛋的人，恐怕只有另一个倒霉蛋了，是吧？跟我来吧，我带你去个安全的地方。”{n}他对你做了个邀请的手势……{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mendigo te mira con escepticismo, piensa por un momento y luego asiente.{/n} «Vale. ¿Quién si no podría ayudar a un alma desdichada en este lugar maldito? Otro desdichado. Venga, le llevaré a un lugar seguro». {n}Hace ademán de que le sigas...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mendigo te mira con escepticismo, piensa por un momento y luego asiente.{/n} «Vale. ¿Quién si no podría ayudar a un alma desdichada en este lugar maldito? Otro desdichado. Venga, le llevaré a un lugar seguro». {n}Hace un gesto de invitación...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Bettler blickt dich skeptisch an, überlegt kurz und nickt dann.{/n} "Schön. Wer sonst sollte in dieser verfluchten Hölle einer hilflosen Seele helfen, wenn nicht eine andere hilflose Seele, oder? Kommt, ich bringe Euch in Sicherheit." {n}Er gibt dir ein Zeichen, ihm zu folgen ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bettler blickt dich skeptisch an, überlegt kurz und nickt dann.{/n} "Schön. Wer sonst sollte in dieser verfluchten Hölle einer hilflosen Seele helfen, wenn nicht eine andere hilflose Seele, oder? Kommt, ich bringe Euch in Sicherheit." {n}Er winkt dich einladend zu sich ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le mendiant vous dévisage, l'air sceptique, et se donne le temps de la réflexion avant de hocher la tête.{/n} « Soit. Qui aidera {mf|un|une} pauvre {mf|malheureux|malheureuse} dans ce lieu maudit, si ce n'est un autre pauvre malheureux, hein ? Allez, venez, je vais vous emmener en lieu sûr. » {n}Il vous fait signe de le suivre...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mendiant vous regarde, l'air sceptique, et se donne le temps de la réflexion avant de hocher la tête.{/n} « OK. Qui aidera {mf|un|une} pauvre {mf|malheureux|malheureuse} dans ce lieu maudit, si ce n'est un autre pauvre malheureux, hein ? Allez, venez, je vais vous mener en lieu sûr. » {n}Il vous fait signe de le suivre...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dilenci sana kuşkuyla bakıyor, bir süre düşünüp başını sallıyor.{/n} "Tamam. Bu lanetli yerde bahtsız bir avanağa, bir diğer bahtsız avanaktan başka kim yardım eder, değil mi? Gel, seni güvenli bir yere götüreyim." {n}Onu takip etmen için el ediyorç{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar looks at you sceptically, thinks for a moment, and then nods.{/n} "Fine. Who else should help a hapless soul in this accursed place if not another hapless sap, right? Come, I'll take you somewhere safe." {n}He beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilenci sana kuşkuyla bakıyor, bir süre düşünüp başını sallıyor.{/n} "Tamam. Bu lanetli yerde bahtsız bir avanağa, bir diğer bahtsız avanaktan başka kim yardım eder, değil mi? Gel, seni güvenli bir yere götüreyim." {n}Onu takip etmen için el ediyorç{/n}
